member.name: M:Enderlook.Unity.Attributes.RestrictTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.Type[])
member.summary:
Restrict the values of this field by only types which implement, inherit or can be casted to all the types from .
Additionally, the values of this field must inherit from .
member.param:
Values must implement, inherit or be castable to all this types.
If a type is a class, it must inherit from . Struct types are not allowed.
